meta.description:
TLD: SCB
Script Identifier: TH
Script Description: Thai
Version: 1.0
Effective Date: 14 July 2014
     Registry: The Siam Commercial Bank PCL.
Contact: tldregistry@scb.co.th
Address: Siam Commercial Bank, 20th Floor Zone B, 9 Ratchadapisek Rd., Jatujak, Bangkok, 10900, Thailand
Telephone: +662 544 1427
Website: http://scb.dotarai.com

Relevant Policy Document URL: http://web.thains.co.th/docs/scb/SCB_IDN_Policy.pdf

This document contains the Thai character table used by .scb (The Siam Commercial Bank PCL.) This table is in compliance with the ICANN Guidelines for the Implementation of Internationalised Domain Names and is intended for publication in the IANA IDN Character Table Registry.
